name: Pro-Grade Screwdriver Repair Kit for Macbook Pro 15" Mid-2009
description:
Pro-Grade Screwdriver Repair Kit for Macbook Pro 15" Mid-2009

This kit fits Macbook Pro 15" Mid-2009 models - Kit includes the Apple security screwdriver for battery removal/replacement that only works with these models:

MacBook Pro (15-inch, Mid 2009)
MacBookPro5,3
Model #: MB985xx/A - 15.4" 2.66GHz
Model #: MB986xx/A - 15.4" 2.8GHz

MacBook Pro (15-inch, 2.53GHz, Mid 2009)
MacBookPro5,3 - Model #: MC118xx/A - 15.4" 2.53GHz

NOTE: These tools & screwdriver bits will also work for many repairs in other Apple Macbook &PC laptops & smartphones.

*AMERICAN MADE (*Drivers, bits & pry tool made in USA- tweezers are imported) LIFETIME FACTORY WARRANTY (*On all drivers & bits)!!! High Quality Chrome vanadium steel blades, Impact resistant, ESD Safe (Anti-static) handles (ALSO AVAILABLE IN QUALITY ALUMINUM HANDLE!(SEE PHOTO #2) - SELECT OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU BELOW) & easy turn swivel top cap

Pro-Grade Repair kit includes the following driver tips:


• One *ESD-Safe Anti-static or Aluminum Handle for reversible tip driver blades (Select option from drop down menu below)

And the following dual reversible tip blades:

• "Torx Plus Tamper 6" x "Torx Plus Tamper 6" (One - 5 point blade on each end - For MacBook Pro 15" tamper resistant battery security screw removal)

• Torx T6 (For LCD display hinge screws) x Torx T5 blade

• Phillips #00 x Phillips #000 (For opening bottom case, internal component screws)

• 1 pair - Precision ESD *Tweezers (Heat, acid & alkali resistant) for removal & installation of small parts & ribbon cables on the logic board, etc. (Tweezers may be slightly different style than those in the photo, similar ESD-Safe & same size but may have slightly different tip, they will work the same as those pictured)
(*Tweezers are imported - limited 30 day replacement warranty)

• 1 - Apple Black Stick - Spudger/pry tool (Menda #35622 Apple part No: # 922-5065) For removing logic board connections, pulling wires & forming solder joints (*No warranty - considered a disposable repair tool)

SELECT OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU BELOW for options available in either ESD Safe Ergonomic Plastic Handle or Quality Machined Aircraft Aluminum Handle with Knurled Grip & Pocket Clip - both feature easy-turn swivel top cap


PLEASE CHECK YOUR REPAIR MANUAL TO ENSURE CORRECT FIT, Download one from our list of official Apple Tech Repair Guides or send me a message with your Mac's info & a list of repairs to confirm compatibility.

name: Reversible 2-in-1 Triwing/TriLobe #0 & #1 Precision Screwdriver-Macbook Pro Battery Tool
description:
Reversible Blade 2-in-1 Triwing/TriLobe #0 & #1 Precision Screwdriver-Macbook Pro, Nintendo, Camera & Electronics Repair Tool

TRIWING #1 is SIMILAR TO APPLE PART NUMBER #: 922-8991 battery tool.

TRIWING #0 is SIMILAR TO APPLE PART NUMBER 922-9013 trackpad tool.

Triwing #1 bit is Apple TriLobe #0/Triwing #0 is equal to Apple TriLobe #00

Listing for one reversible driver handle (*Available in ESD Safe plastic or sturdy anodized aluminum handles - *SELECT HANDLE STYLE IN DROP DOWN MENU BELOW*) with [1] Tri-Lobe #0 & [1] TriLobe #1 (Triwing / Y-Shaped driver tip) precision screwdriver

Each 2-in-1 reversible bit has 1 Trilobe blade driver on each end of the bit, so you're getting two bits for the price of one!

For removing screws to replace battery in 2009-2012 *MacBook Pro 13" & 17", 2009-10 Macbook 13" & 2010-12 *MacBook Pro 15" models. (*Excludes Retina Display models)

TriLobe driver also fits Nintendo Wii controllers, Nintendo DS, Gameboy Advanced, Gameboy Color, Fuji Digital Cameras & more!

*Blades are non-magnetic, but can be magnetized using our Magnetizer tool.

*Pro-grade ESD-Safe & Aluminum handled drivers feature a Lifetime warranty + MADE IN THE USA!

SEE YOUR REPAIR GUIDE FOR COMPATIBILITY FOR YOUR MAC, COMPUTER, iPHONE, SMARTPHONE OR OTHER ELECTRONICS (Official Apple repair guides for most Macs available HERE) - Or email with your system info for compatibility questions.

name: Quality Precision ESD Torx T3 Screwdriver
description:
High Quality - American Made Precision ESD Torx T3 Screwdriver

Made in the USA & feature a lifetime replacement warranty! Quality anti static ergonomic handle for safe use with sensitive electronics (logic board, computer component repair, etc.) with easy-turn swivel top cap for smooth fastener installation or removal & high grade chrome vanadium steel blades for long life.

• 1 - ESD-Safe precision Torx T3 driver (6-point Star bit - see photos for tip profile) - Approximate overall length = 6-1/4" (158mm)

*COMPATIBILITY:

May fit some screws on some Blackberry (possibly Bold, Curve, Storm?), Nokia & other cellphones/smartphones, other small precision electronics.

IMPORTANT!
*Compatibility list is not definite or complete - See your repair manual to ensure correct fit with your device and/or repairs*

name: Pro-Grade Screwdriver Repair Kit for Macbook Air+Retina MacBook Pro
description:
Pro-Grade Screwdriver Repair Kit for Macbook Air + Retina Macbook Pro

This kit fits Macbook Air 2010 & newer + Retina Macbook Pro 2012 & newer models (for extensive repairs like LCD display removal select the 7pc kit with Torx T8 bit).<

*AMERICAN MADE (*Drivers, bits & pry tool made in USA- tweezers are imported) LIFETIME FACTORY WARRANTY (*On all drivers & bits)!!! High Quality Chrome vanadium steel blades, Impact resistant, ESD Safe (Anti-static) handles (ALSO AVAILABLE IN QUALITY ALUMINUM HANDLE!(SEE PHOTO #2) - SELECT OPTIONS FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU BELOW) & easy turn swivel top cap

• One ESD-Safe or Aluminum Handle for reversible tip driver blades

And the following 2-in-1 reversible tip blades:

• PENATLOBE x PENTALOBE (One - 5 point blade on each end) (For removal of bottom case screws on model 2010-2012 Macbook Air 11' / 13" & model 2012 Retina Display Macbook Pro 13" / 15" to access the internal battery & all other components)

• Torx T5 x Torx T6 (T5 - for battery, logicboard, SSD & most other internal compnents) (T6 - for some Retina Macbook Pro 13" internal components)

• One - ESD Safe Black Stick / Spudger Pry Tool (American made by Menda - manufacturer part number #35622 - Apple part number: #922-5065) SAME THAT APPLE GENIUS & CERTIFIED REPAIR TECHS USE! (*No warranty - These are considered a disposable item. While they are they strongest nylon/plastic pry tool available, they are designed to bend, wear or break before the material or parts on the device you're working on breaks or is damaged)

• One pair - NEW! Now features Quality Stainless Steel ESD Tweezers - Made of Anti Static/ESD safe stainless steel - features black protective coating & rounded tips for protecting work. (SEE PHOTO #3 for new Tweezer style)
(*Tweezers not made in USA - limited 30 day replacement warranty)

SELECT OPTIONS FROM THE MENU BELOW for Expanded kits (all options available in either ESD Safe Ergonomic Plastic Handle or Quality Machined Aircraft Aluminum Handle with Knurled Grip & Pocket Clip - both feature easy-turn swivel top cap):


• Macbook Air/Retina Pro - 6pc Kit: Includes all pieces from the 5pc kit + ONE Dual-Tip - Phillips #00 x Phillips #000 (For trackpad removal/replacement)

• Macbook Air/Retina Pro - 7pc Kit: Includes all pieces from the 5pc kit + ONE Dual-Tip - Phillips #00 x Phillips #000 (For trackpad removal/replacement) + ONE Dual Tip Torx T8 x Torx T7 (For LCD Display assembly removal)

Torx Blade bits

Compatibility:

THESE DRIVER BITS WILL FIT 99% of screws in all MacBooks, Macbook Pro, iMac, Mac Pro Mac Mini & iPhone, iPod Touch & *iPad (some repairs on the first gen iPad require additional Torx bits). Good for repairs, replacement & upgrades on battery, hard drive, SSD, Trackpad, logic board, CD-DVD Optical drive, LCD display, keyboards, top case & palmrest & MORE! As well as all PC laptops & desktops, electronics, Game systems (Like Nintendo DS, Wii, Game Cube, controllers, Gameboy Advanced, PS2/3, PSP, Xbox), digital cameras, MP3 players (Zune, Etc.), smart phones (Kyocera, Motorola, Droid, HTC) & more!!! If you find a fastener that it doesn't have a bit for, just send me an email to request the bit be added to this kit & carried as an individual bit to expand these reversible driver handles.

name: Anti-Static ESD Precision Stainless Steel Tweezers
description:
Anti-Static ESD Precision Stainless Steel Tweezers

For work on sensitive electronics components

Brand new - comes packaged in retail "Blister-pack" (SEE PHOTOS).

Description and Compatibility:

Made of quality Anti-static stainless steel for work with sensitive electronics components like: iPhone, iPad, iPod, smartphone, MAC & PC laptop logic boards & various other small components - plus many more uses.

These tweezers are perfect for working on logic boards & other small components. Makes easy work of removing & installing small ribbon cables & logic board connections, installing circuits & chips on chip boards or handling & sorting small ESD sensitive parts.

Available in 3 different styles

• Style: A (Photo #2 - sharp tip)

• Style: B (Photo #3 - rounded tip)

• Style: C (Photo #4 - Curved tip)

SELECT STYLE FROM THE OPTIONS MENU BELOW

name: Precision 12-in-1 Screw Extractor+Screwdriver Set [Stripped Screw Removal Tools]
description:
Precision 12-in-1 Screw Extractor®+Screwdriver Set [Stripped Screw Removal Tools]

100% MADE IN THE USA! Professional grade precision repair tools. American Made + Lifetime Manufacturers warranty!

Very high quality set of precision fastener removal tools & screwdrivers. Custom designed & made for removing stripped out screws & broken fasters on fine precision electronics. These precision Screw Extractors® feature a small "Cross-Hatched" pattern of jagged "teeth" that bite into the fastener & can remove stripped screws as small as 1.1mm in diameter! They can even remove screws that have been snapped off & are completely missing the head! Remove anything from the very tiny iPhone pentalobe case screws to a larger Torx T8 LCD screw on a MacBook Pro or Macbook Air anything in between! ONE OF THE ONLY TOOLS THAT CAN REMOVE BROKEN FASTENERS FROM A RECESSED HOLE! As long as the Screw Extractor® bit can fit down the tapped hole of a broken fastener it can remove the remaining half of the fastener, clearing the obstruction & allowing for a new screw to be installed.

This set includes all driver handles & bits shown in the photo as follows:

• SIX [6] - Annodized Aluminum Handles (for use with ANY 2-in-1 dual-tip reversible driver bits)

• FOUR [4] - Dual-tipped Screw Extractor® driver bits (a total of 4 different sizes) 1.1mm x 1.5mm, 1.25mm x1.25mm, 1.5mm x 1.5mm & 2.0mm x 2.0mm

• TWO [2] - Dual-tipped screwdriver bits - Phillips #0 x 2.2mm Slotted(Flat Head) & Phillips #00 x 1.8mm Slotted(Flat head)

• Packed in a nice, easy to manage vinyl pouch

name: Professional Grade 2-in-1 Precision Screw Extractor Tool (For Removal of Stripped Fasteners)
description:
Professional Grade 2-in-1 Precision Screw Extractor Tool (For Removal of Stripped Fasteners)

Professional grade precision repair tools, 100% MADE IN THE USA! + Lifetime Manufacturers warranty!

High quality precision fastener removal tools. Custom designed & made for removing stripped & broken fasters on fine precision electronics. These Screw Extractors® can remove stripped screws as small as 1.1mm in diameter! They can even remove screws that have been snapped off & are completely missing the head or even broken off a recessed in the hole! Remove any stripped or broken fasteners from the very tiny iPhone pentalobe case screws to a larger Torx LCD screws on a MacBook laptop & anything in between! ONE OF THE ONLY TOOLS THAT CAN REMOVE BROKEN FASTENERS FROM A RECESSED HOLE! As long as the Screw Extractor® bit can fit down the tapped hole of a broken *fastener it can remove the remaining half of the fastener, clearing the obstruction & allowing for a new screw to be installed (excluding special circumstances like use of thread lock, etc.).

This listing is for ONE [1] reversible tip Screw Extractor® (each driver bit is dual-sided & features 2-sizes-in-1. So ONE [1] driver = 2 screw extractors [*some bits have the same size Screw Extractor® on each end])

INCLUDES:

• ONE [1] - Annodized Aluminum Handle (for use with ANY interchangeable dual-tip/2-in-1 reversible driver bits)

• ONE [1] - Dual-tipped screw extractor driver bit (SELECT the size you need from the Drop-Down *OPTIONS MENU*)

SELECT ONE [1] of the following sizes of 2-in-1 /dual-tipped interchangeable Screw Extractor bits (to go with your aluminum handle) from the drop down menu below:

1.1mm x 1.5mm, 1.25mm x1.25mm, 1.5mm x 1.5mm & 2.0mm x 2.0mm

These handles can also be expanded upon by adding other individual 2-in-1 driver bits for any type of fastener for any application you need!

name: Permanent iPhone IMEI Factory Unlock Service (AT&T/GSM only) for iPhone 3G/3GS/4/4S/5
description:
Permanent iPhone IMEI Factory Unlock Service (AT&T/GSM only) for iPhone 3G/3GS/4/4S/5

***NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE***

Due to the extreme price increases from our various unlock service wholesale providers, the overwhelming demand during the past year causing these price increases & the long delays while waiting for unlocks to be processed, we've decide to stop offering this service until prices drop & processing times return to a reasonable time frame averaging less 2-3 days.

Thank you for understanding, we appreciate your business & hope you will continue to shop at our website for your Macbook, iPhone & electronics repair tools.

This is an "Official" carrier unlock for AT&T carrier locked iPhones (all supported iPhone 3G/iPhone 3GS/iPhone 4/iPhone 4S & even new iPhone 5! UNLOCK WORKS WITH ANY AT&T USA IPHONE! NO JAILBREAK! ANY BASEBAND! SUPPORTS NEW iOS6!!
(This listings is for AT&T locked iPhones only, please send a message with your iPhone carrier info for other unlock availability & prices).

Unlock is done remotely via iTunes on your own computer! All we need is your IMEI number (found on your iPhone in the *Settings* app under > General > About > IMEI - or by calling: *#06# on your iPhone), that is sent to Apple & added to their "Official List of unlocked iPhones" server database, which iTunes uses to verify/check to see if each iPhone is available to be unlocked when restoring in iTunes.

PRICING:

Standard processing (iPhone 3G/3GS/4/4S/5): $30 Unlock for ANY AT&T/USA iPhone!
1-24 hour processing.

EXPRESS UNLOCK SERVICE: $75
1-5 hour (if there is any delay you will be contacted with processing info).

IMPORTANT NOTE: WE CAN NOT UNLOCK VERIZON OR SPRINT IPHONES! They operate on a different CDMA frequency & use a different process for unlocking that is MUCH more expensive to process. This service works only for AT&T/USA iPhones (Please contact for pricing & availability for unlocks on other GSM networks)

**PLEASE READ FULL DESCRIPTION FOR AVAILABLE PROCESSING TIMES**

Once you have made your purchase & submitted your IMEI number you will receive a confirmation email & it usually takes less than 24 hours to complete the process (*during active business hours*... SEE BELOW), if purchase is made during off hours your order will be processed as soon as processing begins again on Sunday (sometimes sooner if an AT&T/Apple service rep is available to process on Friday & Saturday).

*AT&T IPHONE unlock TimeFrame*: 1-24 Hours (Depending on service selected, *during noted processing hours*).


Unlock Processing Schedule: (Hours may change)

~ **

UNLOCK ORDERS ARE SUBMITTED TO APPLE SERVERS FOR PROCESSING IMMEDIATELY UPON YOU SUBMITTING YOUR IMEI NUMBER AFTER PURCHASE. AT&T/Apple internal IMEI Processing is done during "Regular business Hours" (approximately 4am - 4pm PACIFIC TIME ZONE) from SUNDAY through THURSDAY.

** Friday & Saturday processing is done on an "If available" basis. If we have a AT&T/Apple contact that is at work during regular "off hours" orders will be processed as usual. If no internal rep is available during "Regular Off Hours", then orders will be processed as soon as next available day/hours, usually resuming Sunday morning.

EXAMPLE: Order placed on Thursday after 3pm will be processed & IMEI submitted on Sunday by 10am PACIFIC(**May be processed sooner depending on availability**).

IMPORTANT!

THIS UNLOCK SERVICE IS FOR IPHONES LOCKED TO AT&T CARRIER NETWORK ONLY! If you're not sure what network your iPhone is locked to you can send us an email with your IMEI number & we will check to see if its AT&T or another network.

*We do offer other carrier unlocks, please send us an email with your carrier info (the carrier your iPhone is locked to) for pricing & availability (Use the "Contact Us" form to send an email).

Once orders are submitted they can NOT BE CANCELLED! We & our processors can NOT STOP orders or issue refunds once IMEI unlock process has been submitted!

IF YOU CAN'T WAIT, DO NOT ORDER!

PLEASE MAKE SURE YOUR IMEI IS SUBMITTED EXACTLY AS ON YOUR IPHONE! DO NOT READ OFF THE BOX! ONLY GET FROM THE IPHONE ITSELF BY SEARCHING SETTINGS OR DIALING: *#06# ON THE IPHONE KEYPAD! INCORRECT SUBMISSIONS CAN NOT BE CHANGED OR REFUNDED, AS ONCE THE ORDER IS PLACED YOUR UNLOCK HAS BEEN SENT TO AT&T/APPLE FOR PROCESSING & THEY WILL NOT ALTER THE PROCESS/REMOVE INCORRECT IMEI's!

HOW TO UNLOCK YOUR IPHONE:

FOLLOW STEPS EXACTLY!

1. Send the IMEI to our email and/or submit in "NOTES" during Paypal checkout (only submit 15 digit IMEI, no spaces!)
2. Wait untill you receive an email from us stating your iPhone has been unlocked
3. Then, install last version of iTunes
4. Make sure phone is updated to the newest version of iOS - updated by official iTunes
5. Connect phone to iTunes with not accepted (not valid) simcard (Like T-mobile in USA)
6. Wait until itunes detect phone
7. Now disconnect phone and reconnect after 10 seconds.
8. Phone Unlocked.

IMPORTANT:

** ITUNES ERRORS & RESTORING ISSUES**

If you have any issues with iTunes errors or don't see an iTunes message saying "Congratulations your iPhone has been unlocked", make sure you have updated your iPhone & iTunes software both. Also if you have an application installed like: TinyUmbrella, make sure that the box "Set server to Cydia on close" is UNCHECKED or just delete the application during the unlocking process, as iTunes needs to "talk" with Apple servers to varify the IMEI Unlock.

NOTE: This is the only "lifetime" unlock solution for Apple iPhone as the IMEI is registered as "Unlocked" in Apple database. This is not a "software" or "hack" unlock, because it's handled by Apple via iTunes on your computer, it's an "OFFICIAL" PERMANENT UNLOCK!

Your phone will always be unlocked even after each new update of your phone firmware or baseband! NO MORE WAITING!! **This unlock is Jailbreak compatible! You can jailbreak, update, restore, etc. & you're iPhone WILL ALWAYS KEEP ITS UNLOCK!!!

name: Individual Screwdriver Handles (ESD, Aluminum, Magnetic)
description:
Screwdriver Handle for interchangeable driver blades

High quality professional grade scewdriver handle. Available in ESD/Anti-static, anodized aluminum, for use with our two-sided reversible tip blade driver bits (the same that come in our Complete Apple Tech Service Repair Kit.

We offer the following bits for the ESD & Anodized aluminum handles: (Many driver bits have two different sized bits on either side, some have two of the same [*driver bits for the Magnetized Aluminum Handle are one sided & may not have all sizes available*].

• Torx: T5/T6, T7/TR8, TR9/TR10 (TR= Tamper Resistant with security hole in the tip) *Smaller sizes available down to Torx T1 but are special order.
• Phillips: #0/#00, #00/#000, #1/#0
• Phillips JIS (Japanes Industry Standard): #00/#000
• Tri-Lobe (Triwing/Y-shape): #1/#0
• Pentalobe (Torx Tamper Plus Five[5]-Pointed Star bits): T1/T1 (for iPhone), T5/T5 (Macbook Air), T6/T6 (Macbook Pro 15" mid-2009 battery security tool screwdriver)

Driver bits for the Magnetized Aluminum Handle are limited to Torx Six [6] point star bits & standard Phillips, slotted/flat head, hex head & micro but driver bits:

• *Torx: T5/T6, T7/TR8, TR9/TR10 (TR= Tamper Resistant with security hole in the tip) *Smaller sizes available down to Torx T1 but are special order.
• Phillips: #1, #0, #00, #000
• Phillips JIS (Japanes Industry Standard): #1, #0, #00, #000
• Micro Nut drivers: *4mm (*More sizes available in US Standard & metric, but are special order.
• Hex driver bits: *2mm (*More sizes available in US Standard & metric, but are special order. Email for a full list or send your requested sizes for a custom special order invoice)
• Also available in Hex ball tip drivers, micro open end wrench, awl tip & spline tip

See the individual driver blade section for full listing availability!

*Also available in an 8pc kit (includes an Extra Flat blade driver for completing extensive repairs on iPhone 4 4S & iPhone 5). New - comes packaged in a retail "Blister pack" packaging (molded plastic & cardboard backing).

Best iPhone Screwdriver Repair Kit includes the following Precision MAGNETIC screwdrivers:

• 1 - Small precision MAGNETIC Phillips #00 (1.5mm) screwdriver • 1 - Small precision MAGNETIC iPhone Pentalobe (5 point star) screwdriver blade (for iPhone pentalobe screws on iPhone 4/4S & iPhone 5 - all models, including AT&T, Verizon & Sprint) • 1 - Suction cup - for pulling the glass cover off iPhone, iPod & iPad cases, battery covers, LCD display touch screens & more! • 1 - "Guitar pick" style pry tool for working open & separating glass cover from the LCD digitizer on iPhone, iPod & iPad. • 1 - Precision metal tweezers - for picking up small parts, installing components & removing small part ribbon cables on logic board or other component connections

The tools in the 7pc iPhone repair kit are good for *Any repairs on iPhone 2G 3G & 3GS, and *Most Repairs on newer iPhone 4, 4S & iPhone 5 (*Choose "Option B" for all extensive repairs on iPhone 4/4S/5 that includes an additional flat blade driver for one screw in these models). From replacing the back cover glass plate, replacing the battery, extensive repairs like replacing the iPhone home button, speakers, volume & power/sleep, mute/vibrator switches, front LCD Digitizer & more!

This is our economy grade iPhone repair kit - For a higher quality kit see our Complete 10pc iPhone Repair Kit or our high quality 5pc iPhone screwdriver kit(also has tools for Macbook laptops!).

name: ESD-Safe Precision Tweezers-for Fine Computer Repairs [Anti-Static]
description:
ESD-Safe Precision Tweezers-for Fine Computer Repairs [Anti-Static]

For fine work on sensitive electronics in Laptops, Desktops, iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad & any smartphone or electronics repair like: pulling logic board components, ribbon cables, fine wiring, etc. on MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, iPhone & any other computer, smartphone (Samsung Galaxy S3/SIII/S2/SII, BlackBerry, HTC One, Motorola Droid, etc.) or precision electronics repair.

Available individually or in bulk lots of 10pcs

Made of quality ESD-Safe heat resistant thermoplastic [Carbon-Fiber] - Resistant to acid, alkaline and heat up to 200℃/392°F. These Precision Tweezers also come with other repair kits - Including our EXCLUSIVE Professional 12pc Apple Service Tech Repair Tool Kit

name: ESD Black Stick-Spudger Pry Tool-iPhone Opener (Generic)
description:
Generic version of Apple’s famous “Black Stick” pry tool & soldering spudger.


Currently SOLD OUT of the Generic "Black Stick" Spudgers - check HERE for the American made version that Apple Genius Bar employees use!

Made of ESD safe Thermoplastic - acid, alkali & heat resistant up to ~ 200ºC/392ºF

Part No.: (Similar to Apple #922-5065 & Menda #35622) May be stamped with “Switzerland #35622” or “Menda #35622 - Chino, CA”, but are manufactured in China

Available in multiple quantities: 1pcs, 10pcs, 50pcs & 100pcs (SELECT FROM MENU BELOW)

These have one flat end for prying, scraping, etc. with a notch for wire pulling & one pointed end for poking, prodding & both can be used for forming solder joints & rework. Essential for repair of Macbook, iPhone, iPod, iPad & any other Mac, PC laptop or sensitive electronics repair, assembly or tear-downs. Used everyday by myself & almost every other repair tech for removing iDevice screens & logic board connections like clasps & ribbon cables.

No electronics repair technician should be caught dead without at least a handful of these tools at all times!

name: Anti Static ESD Wrist Strap w/Grounding Cord+Aligator Clip
description:
Economy Anti Static Grounded Wrist Strap

For reducing or eliminating static & ESD (electro-static discharge) while working on sensitive electronic components: Macbook, laptop, iPhone, iPad, smartphone, logic board, LCD, etc. Simply wrap strap around wrist and clip to a grounded source. Prevent Static shock in dry environment

Keep static from damaging electronic parts & components during service or repairs.

Adjustable wrist strap with alligator clip tip

Inner conducting layer made of stainless shell filaments

Durable Polyurethane Coated Coil Cords - full extended length ~ approximately 6 ft. (1.82m)

Adjustable soft elastic band for comfort during use.

Manfacturer's specs:

Current limiting resistor 1M ohm ± 5%

Static dissipative time ~ 0.1sec

name: Powerful Magnetizer - Demagnetizer Tool
description:
Powerful Magnetizer - Demagnetizer Tool

Brand new in box

Description:

TIRED OF DROPPING SCREWS DOWN IN YOUR COMPUTER DURING REPAIRS?!! THEN THIS TOOL IS JUST WHAT YOU NEED! Great tool for Magnetizing screwdrivers, tweezers, pickup tools or any other metal tools or parts. Also can Demagnetize any metal that's already magnetized! Great for removing magnetism from screwdrivers for specific sensitive repairs of electronics or for Magnetizing tools where you want the ability to hold fasteners during removal.

Perfect for uses when you only want your tool magnetized for a short period of time to complete one repair. One or two swipes with this tool on your screwdriver & no screw will escape it!

Add this MAGNETIZER tool to your cart before checkout to magnetize or remove magnetism from ANY SCREWDRIVER, KIT OR METAL TOOL!
